name: tide-js
description: An interface to interact with the Tide ecosystem
author: Tide (info@tide.org)

scripts.build: npm run conf:prd && webpack --config ./webpack/webpack.prod.js && node tools/build
scripts.intest: npm run build && cp dist/tide.js '../Tide.Usecase/Basic Page/js/tide.js' && cp dist/tide.js.map '../Tide.Usecase/Basic Page/js/tide.js.map'
scripts.conf:dev: npm rm -S cryptide && npm i file:../../../cryptide-js -S
scripts.conf:prd: npm rm -S cryptide && npm i cryptide -S
